Uses of Class
expr.Expr

  • Packages that use Expr 
    Package Description
    expr
    This package contains all of the possible expression combinations that can occur within this compiler.
    stmts
    This package contains the classes that define the Logo Statement syntax.

    • Uses of Expr in expr

      Subclasses of Expr in expr 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BinaryExpr
      This class represents a binary expression in Logo
      class  IdentExpr
      This class is used to represent an 'Ident' expression
      class  NumExpr
      This class is used to represent a number expression
      class  PrimaryExpr
      This abstract class defines the basis and method of parsing a Primary type Expression
      Fields in expr declared as Expr 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Expr BinaryExpr.left 
      Expr BinaryExpr.right 
      Methods in expr that return Expr 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Expr NumExpr.parse()
      This method parses number expressions and returns an Expr object
      static Expr Expr.parse()
      This Constructor is used to return the expression to caller after working out precedence.
      static Expr PrimaryExpr.parse()
      This method is used to self parse the Expression
      static Expr IdentExpr.parse()
      This method is used to parse the object that contains it and return the corrected Expr
      Constructors in expr with parameters of type Expr 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryExpr(Expr left, OperatorToken oper, Expr right)
      This Constructor is used to fill the attributes of the Binary Expression as called by precedence setting method "fraserHanson".

    • Uses of Expr in stmts

      Constructors in stmts with parameters of type Expr 
      Constructor and Description
      ConditionalStmt(Expr expr, Stmts thenStmts, Stmts elseStmts)
      Constructor method to create the contents of a conditional statement object
      ForwardStmt(Expr expr)
      This Constructor is used to create the forward statement using the input expression
      FunctionCallStmt(java.lang.String name, Expr expr)
      Constructor taking in the name of the function to call and an expression to create a statement
      LeftStmt(Expr expr)
      This Constructor is used to create the Left statement using the inputted expression
      RightStmt(Expr expr)
      This Constructor is used to create the forward Stmt
